sections.heading: Legislative finding.Section 32-86a
sections.text: - Transferred to Chapter 184b, Sec. 10-417.Section 32-86b to 32-88. - State agency requests for proposals for film, video or media productions. Connecticut film, video and media account. Connecticut Film, Video and Media Commission. Commission's powers and duties.

sections.heading: to 32-88. - State agency requests for proposals for film, video or media productions
sections.text:
Sections 32-86b to 32-88, inclusive, are repealed, effective August 20, 2003.

(June Sp. Sess. P.A. 83-26, S. 2, 3, 7; P.A. 91-405, S. 4; P.A. 94-137, S. 3â€“6, 9; P.A. 95-250, S. 1; P.A. 96-211, S. 1, 5, 6; P.A. 97-238, S. 8; June 30 Sp. Sess. P.A. 03-6, S. 248.)

sections.heading: Powers. Promotion of motion picture industry.
sections.text:
Section 32-89 is repealed, effective July 1, 1995.

(June Sp. Sess. P.A. 83-26, S. 4, 7; P.A. 94-137, S. 8, 9.)

sections.heading: Regulations.
sections.text:

sections.text:
